title: Source file not found Disk1
body:
Recently reset my computer  and now league won't install correctly.  The full error message says. 

Sourcefile not found: Users\Appdata\Roaming\Riot games\ League of legends 4.2.1\ install\disk1.cab. Verify that the file exists and that you can access it

replies.body: This can happen if a security config on your OS or even antivirus is blocking the file from being read, so it might not actually be missing.  To start, I recommend going through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is allowed.  I hope that helps!
i tryied everything and still i cant install it. what i can do?

Ive tried running admin, Ive updated all my security Ive run checks and all that stuff. Ive disabled firewalls and stuff. It seems nothing is working I don't know what else to do. I remember last time I had a problem installing league all I had to do was move files around but it seems Its not working or im not moving them to the right places. Also whenever i try to download somewhere else it automatically goes to the same place.  I guess I'm hopeless lol
